DOC.brief_summary: Abusive prescribing expose patient unnecessary health risk result wasteful public expenditure . This study evaluate innovative approach fight abusive prescription : sending letter suspect inappropriate prescribers warn outlier compare peer flag review . The study target high prescribers Seroquel ( Quetiapine ) , atypical antipsychotic . Using claim data , investigator assess effect letter prescribe Seroquel , receipt Seroquel patient , substitution behavior prescribers patient , health outcome patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Informative Letters Prescription Receipt Seroquel
